name: RavenCMS
short_description: RavenCMS™ (formerly RavenNuke™) is the smart choice to fulfill your needs; whether you need to build a simple or complex website, whether it is for your personal, organizational or business needs. It comes complete with a variety of great looking themes and a variety of built in modules that we are sure you will find extremely useful. If that is not enough,RavenCMS™ is search engine friendly, conforms to security and web standards and has an active support community. There is also a large community dedicated to developing third party modules and other add-ons you can install. In short, RavenCMS™ is created with security, ease of use and ease of installation in mind which makes it the CMS of choice for both newcomers and seasoned web developers.
summary: A search engine friendly, security and web standards compliant CMS
